name: Star Wars Galaxies: Jump to Lightspeed
name_original: Star Wars Galaxies: Jump to Lightspeed
description:
Star Wars Galaxies: Jump to Lightspeed is a RPG-simulation massively multiplayer game developed by Sony Online Entertainment. It was originally released in 2004. LucasArts Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Star Wars Galaxies: Jump to Lightspeed on PC.
